name: Capital Fire
description:
A terrible combination of distorted nationalism and lust for power resulted in a catastrophic experiment that spiraled completely out of control.
In this action-adventure RPG that combines exploration with fast-paced combat, the player must search for keys, lives and energy crystals in the remains of the ancient capital, Brasilia, the stage for the battle between survivors and zombies.



In Capital Fire, a game that combines exploration with dynamic combat, the character symbolizes the hope of a future where justice and democracy are reborn from the ashes, even in the shadows of a zombie apocalypse. Estrela is a young defender of democracy, the last line of defense against a threat that goes beyond patriotic zombies.




With her red hair, she uses the X power to capture zombies, take emus out of trances, destroy Fake News machines and defeat bosses throughout her adventure.
